findings.title: Token Supply Manipulation
findings.description: According to the Tokenomics documentation provided by the Customer, EXO token will have a maximum supply of 10 billion tokens. In the contract, the owner or the bridge address can mint tokens infinitely.

findings.title: Users Cannot Withdraw All Funds
findings.description: Logic issue in multiClaim function prevents users from withdrawing both earned reward and staked amount when the reward time is up.
